## initializeNodeEnvironmentInBrowser variable

Spawn a node-based environment from the renderer process. Should be invoked \*only\* from the renderer process.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initializeNodeEnvironmentInBrowser: EnvironmentInitializer<
  Promise<IActiveEnvironment>,
  Omit<InitializeNodeEnvironmentOptions, "runtimeArguments">
>;
```
